name: Not your Pawn!
description:
(F for Fullscreen)

In this Action-Arcade game, you play as a sentient pawn fighting other chess pieces. Throw dice to roll them and hit your enemies with the correct numbers.

This game was completed in under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Turn volume up! The submission volume is pretty low for some reason :(

Programming by ButteredCoffee.

Art by JustHellygar.

Sounds and Music by Benimaru.

JOIN OUR DISCORD!

  • WASD - Move
  • SPACE - Dash
  • MOUSE - Aim
  • LMB - Shoot
  • ESC - Pause
